HORROR_INTENSITY.0: pure classic beauty and authenticity; no horror motifs; clean temples and calm desert light.
HORROR_INTENSITY.1: whispered mythic presence—long shadows, faint deity silhouettes, ancient whispers; no gore.
HORROR_INTENSITY.2: stronger supernatural charge—glowing glyphs, living statues, sacred omens; tasteful and non-graphic.
HORROR_INTENSITY.3: cosmic awe within Egyptian canon—impossible geometry in reliefs, star-dark recesses, haloed eyes; strictly no gore or modern elements.
